message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I believe the product is worth less to me than $120. My counteroffer is $95.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand that you think the product is worth less to you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $110.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I still feel that $95 would be a fair price for the product. My counteroffer remains at $95.
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, Bob. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to get at least $105 for the product. My counteroffer is $105.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe we can find a better solution. I am willing to pay $100 for the product. My final offer is $100.

I'm not willing to sell the product for $100, Bob. I think it's worth more than that. My next offer is $115. I'm getting a bit concerned that I might not get the price I want, so I'm willing to go up a bit higher.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I must stick to my budget. I am unable to increase my offer beyond $100. This is my final offer.
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob! I've got a minimum price in mind, and I'm not willing to sell for less. My next offer is $110. This is my final compromise.
